mapper.insert: insert into order_table( user_id, store_id, use_start_time, order_status, create_time, is_del) values( #{po.userId}, #{po.storeId}, #{po.useStartTime}, #{po.orderStatus}, now(), 0)
mapper.update: update order_table set is_del = 1 where order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.select: SELECT A.order_id, A.user_id, A.store_id, A.use_start_time, A.use_end_time, A.user_hours, A.apply_fee, A.order_status, A.coupon_id, B.coupon_name, A.create_time FROM order_table A LEFT JOIN coupon B ON A.coupon_id = B.coupon_id WHERE A.is_del = 0 AND A.user_id =#{userId}
